title: Volkswagen 's EU share : new-car registrations in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
Month Aug 18 has the highest Market share and Sep 18 has the lowest Market share.
There is a difference of 6.1 between the maximum Month Aug 18 and minimum Month Sep 18.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Month Aug 18 and lowest at Month Sep 18.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
Month Aug 18 has the highest Market share and Sep 18 has the lowest Market share.
There is a difference of 6.1 between the maximum Month Aug 18 and minimum Month Sep 18.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Month Aug 18 and lowest at Month Sep 18.
Month Nov 19 has the second highest value for Market share.
Month Sep 18 has 1.92 times less Market share than Month Aug 18 which is the highest.
Market share at Month Aug 18 is 12.7 , second place is Nov 19 at 12.3, and thirdly is Oct 19 at 12.1.
Overall Market share has grew over the Months.
Month Jul 19, and Nov 18 have a similar Market share that is 11.8.
Considered together, the average Market share in all 17 Months is roughly 11.05.
